name: mister
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the complete form of the title
Mr
an informal and sometimes rude form of address for a man whose name you do not know: Listen to me, mister, I don't ever wanna see you in this bar again.

Mr.
infml Mister is also of a way of getting the attention of a man you do not know: Hey, Mister, do you know what time it is?
